.. _fluidtypo3-vhs-media-size:

========================================
media.size ViewHelper `<vhs:media.size>`
========================================


Returns the size of the provided file in bytes.


.. _fluidtypo3-vhs-media-size_arguments:

Arguments
=========


.. _media.size_path:

path
----

:aspect:`DataType`
   string

:aspect:`Required`
   false
:aspect:`Description`
   Path to the file to determine size for.
